channel.title: pkm, roam on
channel.description: Recent content in pkm, roam on

item.description: Obsidian vs. Roam The last 18 months could be classified as “the rise of the connected note-taking app.” In the past year, Roam Research raised $9 million dollars (with a $200 million valuation) , Obsidian was nominated for the Product Hunt Golden Kitty award from for the Productivity category, and countless other note-taking apps entered the productivity space with their own version of bidirectional linking features.
